item.name: Lavendar
item.description: Behold, the lavender candle: because your existence is so mundane, you need a glorified wax stick to remind you of the outdoors. Let the soothing aroma of lavender mock your futile attempts at finding inner peace, while you drown in a sea of mediocrity.

item.name: Birthday Cake
item.description: Behold, the birthday cake scented candle: because apparently, the sweet smell of disappointment and aging is what everyone desires on their special day.
